blogs.title: What is test-driven development?
blogs.excerpt: Test-driven development (TDD), is an evolutionary approach to development that combines test-first development where you write a test before you write just enough production code to fulfil that test and refactoring.

blogs.title: Styling Audio tag
blogs.excerpt: As a frontend developer, one of my biggest frustration is to style replaced elements. It can be a daunting task when on deadlines with designs to match.

blogs.title: Git Commands I learnt this week
blogs.excerpt: Git is a version control system (VCS) for tracking changes in computer files and coordinating work on those files among multiple people. It is primarily used for source code management in software development

blogs.title: What I know about object-oriented programming
blogs.excerpt: It is a programming paradigm based on the concept of, which may contain data, in the form of fields, often known as attributes; and code, in the form of procedures, often known as methods

blogs.title: Version Control(Git)
blogs.excerpt: This is a software that helps software developers to work together and maintain a complete history of their work.

complete applications.name: Cable Masters
complete applications.description: Provides solutions with which installations in industry, utility and infrastructure can be realized as quickly, safely and efficiently as possible. Cablemaster expertise and dedication go-to partner for safe and reliable installations.

complete applications.name: Nobeach
complete applications.description: Nobeach is a Dutch travel agency website that specializes in beach-free vacations. They offer alternative vacation options that do not involve spending time at the beach

complete applications.name: Geefinzicht
complete applications.description: This platform helps individuals connect with experts who can provide assistance with various health and wellness issues. The website features a diverse group of experts, including therapists, coaches, and healers, who offer guidance and support for a range of topics, from mental health to personal growth.

complete applications.name: Sportways
complete applications.description: SportWays offers a range of hockey camps for players of all ages and skill levels.

complete applications.name: Quirkycoders
complete applications.description: The project aims to help developers find new career opportunities by providing a platform to search for tech jobs.

small projects.name: Our Giving Board
small projects.description: The platform enables users to contribute funds in an help each other in turns

small projects.name: Wazi
small projects.description: The webpage promotes an anonymous digital therapy service that allows users to talk to a certified Kenyan therapist over the phone or through video/audio calls.

open source projects.name: Kentekencheck Search
open source projects.description: This is vehicle registration check service for the Netherlands. The service allows users to search for information about a specific vehicle by its registration number (kenteken nummer in Dutch).
